subject: Baseball
lead_paragraph: After smashing their previous attendance mark, set in 1988, by having 3,379,551 pass through the Shea turnstiles, the Mets are aiming even higher in 2007.
snippet: After smashing their previous attendance mark, set in 1988, by having 3,379,551 pass through the Shea turnstiles, the Mets are aiming even higher in 2007.
